title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 19 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 19 2022
description:
Washington Post reporter, Taylor Lorenz, who claimed "severe PTSD" from Internet criticism, then doxxed and harasses an anonymous Twitter accountant and Libs of TikTok creator and family. Why is the left so scared of Libs of TikTok? Attorney General of Virginia Jason Miyares joins Clay and Buck to discuss the emergency application Virginia and 15 other states have filed asking Supreme Court to stop race-based high school admissions policy. What can state Attorneys General due to fight back on this crime wave? ESPN's Mel Kiper announces he's unvaccinated and unable to attend NFL draft.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
